property.name: text
property.value: TTE Controller: Take incoming messages, add an 'address' to the message and send them to the switch. Time-triggered messages are buffered and only sent out at the beginning of the period. Event-triggered messages are sent out immediately.

property.name: text
property.value: TTE Switch: Forward messages to the correct receivers ('Address' specified in the Recordtoken).

property.name: text
property.value:
incoming token: address of receiver(s), message (framelength between 6.72 and 123.36us in 100mbit/s networks)
i am assuming a feasible TT schedule
